description: The Rustbite Beetle is a large, metallic-colored insect known for its ability to corrode and devour metal. Found in ancient ruins and abandoned mines, these beetles are a menace to adventurers and blacksmiths alike, as they can quickly reduce weapons and armor to rusted scraps.

traits.name: Rust Aura
traits.description: Metallic objects within 5 feet of the Rustbite Beetle begin to rust and corrode. Non-magical metal objects that start their turn within this area take 1d4 damage, reducing their durability and effectiveness.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is wearing non-magical metal armor or is made of metal, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or the metal corrodes, reducing its AC by 1.
